popup.title: Refocus and Recharge!
popup.message: Hey there! It looks like you've been browsing for a bit.  Let's get you back on track with your coding!  Take a short break and then dive back into building amazing things.
popup.fun_fact: Did you know that the first computer bug was literally a moth found stuck in a relay of the Harvard Mark II computer in 1947?

recommendation.title: React 18 Fundamentals
recommendation.description: Learn the basics of React 18, including new features and best practices. This video provides a comprehensive overview of the framework for beginners and those looking to refresh their skills.

alternative.title: Understanding React Components
alternative.description: A helpful article explaining the fundamental building blocks of React applications—components. Learn about functional and class components, props, and state.

popup.title: Refocus and Recharge!
popup.message: Hey there!  It seems like you've been working hard on your Vite + React project.  Take a quick break to refocus and then dive back in!
popup.fun_fact: Did you know that the name 'React' comes from the fact that the library updates the user interface by reacting to changes in data?

recommendation.title: React Tutorial for Beginners - Full Course
recommendation.description: Learn React from scratch in this comprehensive tutorial.  Covers components, JSX, state, and more.

alternative.title: Understanding React's Virtual DOM
alternative.description: A deep dive into the Virtual DOM, a key concept that makes React so efficient and performant.

popup.title: Refocus and Recharge!
popup.message: Hey there!  It looks like you've been browsing for a bit. Let's get you back on track with your React coding!  Take a quick break to refocus, then dive back in.
popup.fun_fact: Did you know that React, the JavaScript library you're using, was initially created by a single engineer at Facebook and later open-sourced?

recommendation.title: React Fundamentals: A Beginner's Guide (2024)
recommendation.description: This comprehensive tutorial covers the essential concepts of React, from components and JSX to state management and hooks. Perfect for solidifying your understanding.

alternative.title: Understanding React Hooks
alternative.description: Dive deeper into React Hooks, a powerful feature that simplifies state management and side effects in functional components.
